long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly scrape or copy LinkedIn profile data in just a few clicks!
The LinkedIn Profile Scraper & Copier is a productivity tool designed for recruiters, business professionals, and anyone who needs to gather essential LinkedIn profile information quickly and easily. With this extension, you can extract public profile data such as names, job titles, companies, education, and contact details (if available) and export it for professional or research purposes.

Key Features:
> One-Click Profile Extraction: Collect key details like name, headline, current position, company, education, and more from public LinkedIn profiles.
> Send email.
> Seamless Download: Save profiles in a database and display on a dashboard.
> Manage scraped profile: Send email or simply get in touch with your customers.
> CSV & JSON Export: Download all extracted data in CSV format for efficient use in other applications like Excel, Google Sheets, or database software.
Simple UI & Lightweight: Enjoy a clean, easy-to-use interface without any extra clutter. No need for heavy software installations!

How It Works:
1. Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Visit any public LinkedIn profile.
3. Click the extension icon in the browser toolbar.
4.Scrape and copy profile data with one click, or export it to CSV.

Use Cases:
- Recruitment: Quickly gather candidate information for job positions.
- Lead Generation: Extract relevant data for building business contacts or marketing lists.
- Networking: Easily copy profiles to keep track of important connections.

Privacy Policy:
Your privacy is our top priority. LinkedIn Profile Scraper & Copier only extracts data from public LinkedIn profiles that are accessible based on your current LinkedIn permissions. The extension does not store, share, or transmit any personal data externally. All data remains securely on your device.
